synopsis.text:
Arcana Hanged Man vanquished, the Specialized Extracurricular Execution Squad (SEES) led by Makoto Yuki anticipates the end of their relentless battles against the Shadows as autumn sets in. Amidst life-altering clashes, some members confront the heart-wrenching loss of loved ones, while others uncover the true essence of their fight or grapple with the purpose behind the bloodshed. As the team's resolve is tested, enigmatic transfer student Ryoji Mochizuki arrives at Gekkoukan High School, and the wheels of destiny begin to churn.

Meanwhile, SEES member Junpei Iori finds himself abducted by Chidori Yoshino, a member of the rival group Strega. Despite believing they achieved their goal, the Dark Hour and Tartarus persist, forcing the team to face their personal struggles and determine the true cause they fight for. As Makoto and Junpei embark on journeys of self-discovery, Ryoji's true identity and Aegis's animosity towards him come to light.

With each passing day, the bonds between the heroes are tested, and a new battle to preserve their connections commences. As they brace themselves for the challenges ahead, the team inches closer to understanding the depths of their fears and the importance of the people they cherish.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
